summary: Test module that validates both offline parsing of WMI class definitions and live interaction with Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) COM interfaces over SMB RPC, covering authentication, namespace access, object retrieval, method execution, query handling, and activation scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the SMB RPC library's WMI functionality by detecting regressions and ensuring compliance with Windows WMI COM specifications through comprehensive unit tests.
